abstract: Doubts have resurfaced about the future of Charles O. Prince III, C.E.O. of Citigroup, which has stumbled in recent months.
snippet: Doubts have resurfaced about the future of Charles O. Prince III, C.E.O. of Citigroup, which has stumbled in recent months.
lead_paragraph: IN late July, Charles O. Prince III began daily meetings with about 10 of Citigroup’s highest-ranking executives in his cherry-paneled library to discuss financial threats looming over the world’s largest bank. Mr. Prince had recently presided over Citigroup’s most profitable quarter since he became chief executive four years earlier, but the bank’s brain trust was worried.

headline.print_headline: The Man In Citi’s Hot Seat

byline.original: By Eric Dash and Landon Thomas Jr
